item.description:
"Gorgeneering" is the Northeast's version of canyoneering/canyoning; traveling downriver through waterfalls, cliffs, and caves. With the assistance of two guides, we will rappel into the gorge, negotiate class II+ rapids, swim through small caves and holes in the rock, and jump off of small cliffs along the way.

Trips meet in Thetford, VT and happen every week. Price is $125 per person and includes all rental gear (harness, hardware, helmet, PFD, wetsuit, and lunch). A 50% non-refundable deposit is required at the time of RSVP.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Gorgeneering in Vermont
